short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searching in cursive, bold texts, headers or links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Search CBU" searches in different styles of text on a page.

IMPORTANT: After installing this extension, you must reload any existing tabs or restart Chrome for the extension to work.

Instructions:

1. Open a new tab and navigate to any webpage.
2. Hit Alt-Shift-F.
3. Choose desired tab(from left to right: bold, cursive, header, link).
4. Enter text to input.
5. Press Escape to exit or just reload the page.
